page.title: 04CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
{ CHILDRENS GAMES.}
We dont play many games now; we'd rather sit around and talk to each other,but when we were small we played a lot of different games.
There was "Billy 1,2,3" like hide and seek. You have to hide and if the catcher sees you he has to shout "Billy 1,2,3" and say where you are. There were loads of popular skipping games to rhymes and songs.
Then there was "Bunny Through the Hole"-another chase game.If you are caught you have to stand dead still.You can only be released by someone who is still free crawling through your legs.The last person to be caught would be the catcher for the next game.
